VirtualAppliance.Title: ASPLinux 11.2
VirtualAppliance.Description:
This is desktop solution by one of the most popular Linux distributive vendors ASPLinux. The default installation includes all the rest of office applications, browsers, email clients and many other desktop tools.
Network is configured dynamically with DHCP.

Applications installed:
- Xorg 6.9.0;
- OpenOffice 2.0.1;
- Gnome 2.14.3;
- KDE 3.5.5;
- Xfce 2.4.3;
- Firefox 1.5.0.10;
and many others...

md5sum:
d762fb7a22dcedcada246e5e0586ec08

Requirements.Disk: Disk space: 3 Gb + up to 4 Gb for data
